text: What will be the easiest way for converting the existing template into DND template?

Hi everyone, I made multiple custom modules in HubSpot CMS. They work perfectly on website pages & landing pages, but they are unavailable on Blogs. Actually, I do not even see the "Add" tab there and based on the error in the terminal, they seem to be unsupported in the Blog. I found this post on Community forum -> <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Drag-amp-Drop-functionality-for-Blog-Posts/idi-p/408909>

While it also suggests that currently, it is not possible, I got confused by this message there -> *The only way to achive this right now is a custom module with all possible content types and pre-defined layouts and a repeater function.*

What does it mean? :face_with_raised_eyebrow:

If youâ€™re working on a site that was built with the old drag and drop design manager templates and are looking to upgrade to the new theme functionality with dnd_areas we have a guide:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/add-theme-features-to-existing-sites>
